articles.title: At least nine people killed in shooting at South Africa tavern - Al Jazeera
articles.description: South African police say a manhunt is under way after a mass shooting killed at least nine people and injured 10.

articles.title: Game Recap: Bears mount incredible comeback to knock off Packers in OT - Chicago Bears
articles.description: Just when you thought you had seen the most dramatic, astonishing, improbable comeback victories by the cardiac Bears this year, they topped each and every one of them Saturday night in the most important game of the season.

articles.title: Powerball winning numbers for Dec. 20 drawing; $1.5 billion jackpot - USA Today
articles.description: You can get another chance to win Powerball's 5th largest jackpot as more than $1.5 billion is on the line.

articles.title: Game Recap: Eagles 29, Commanders 18 - Philadelphia Eagles
articles.description: The Eagles capture the 2025 NFC East title after beating the Commanders on Saturday night.

articles.title: Weight loss jabs: What happens when you stop taking them? - BBC
articles.description: You may have lost the weight you wanted to lose - but now you've stopped the jabs, how easy is it to keep it off?

articles.title: Indie Game Awards disqualify Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 after generative AI controversy - Notebookcheck
articles.description: According to a statement issued by the Indie Game Awards, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has been stripped of both awards it won. This decision came after producer François Meurisse confirmed the use of generative AI in the game’s development.

articles.title: Why Lane Kiffin Earned $250K Contract Bonus from Ole Miss After Leaving for LSU - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Lane Kiffin is reportedly getting paid for Ole Miss' victory in the first round of the College Football Playoff despite having left the program in November to join LSU.

articles.title: Comedian Bowen Yang announces he's leaving Saturday Night Live - BBC
articles.description: Yang, one of the most prominent cast members, also hosts a podcast and stars in the Wicked film series.

articles.title: Apple, Google tell workers on visas to avoid leaving the U.S. amid Trump immigration crackdown - NPR
articles.description: With months-long consulate and embassy delays being reported, the two tech companies say staying put in the U.S. right now could prevent workers from getting stranded in their home countries.

articles.title: George Clooney's Sister Adelia Zeidler Dead at 65 - TMZ
articles.description: George Clooney's sister Adelia "Ada" Zeidler has died ... and, the star has memorialized her with a heartfelt statement.

articles.title: Never pay for cloud storage again with this lifetime 20TB deal - Mashable
articles.description: Finally, a cloud storage plan you don’t have to upgrade.

articles.title: Epstein files include child porn complaint a decade before federal investigation - The Washington Post
articles.description: Maria Farmer has long claimed that she warned the FBI about Jeffrey Epstein in the 1990s but that the agency ignored her complaint.

articles.title: RFK Jr. wanted to endorse the Danish vaccine schedule. He was forced to pull back. - Politico
articles.description: Legal and political concerns prompted the health department to cancel a planned announcement on Friday, officials said.

articles.title: ‘Forever Chemicals’ Linked to Another Health Condition, Study Says - AOL.com
articles.description: Researchers have found a new link between exposure to ‘forever chemicals’ and one lifelong health condition. A Sweden-based study found that people exposed to two major environmental toxins are more likely to be diagnosed with multiple sclerosis.

articles.title: Rob Reiner's son Nick still on suicide watch, in solitary confinement after being charged with parents' murders - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Rob Reiner's son Nick Reiner remains on suicide watch and is in solitary confinement after being charged with his parents' murders, a police source says.

articles.title: ‘Super flu’ hitting these states the hardest: Here are the symptoms - AL.com
articles.description: Hospitalization rates went up by 14.3% nationwide as of Friday.

articles.title: Box Office: ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’ Ignites to $36.5 Million on Opening Day - Variety
articles.description: James Cameron's thrid 'Avatar' film grossed $36.5 million on its opening day.

articles.title: Rare look inside the secret LEGO Museum reveals the system behind a toy giant's remarkable longevity - CBS News
articles.description: To what does LEGO owe its remarkable half-century success story? CBS News visits the toy giant's Denmark headquarters to find out.
